app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p: The following are available online at https://www.mdpi.com/1999-4915/13/2/218/s1. Supplemental Table S1, alternative polyadenylation utilization (APAU) transcripts; Supplemental Table S2, identity and expression of pathway-enriched APAU genes; Supplemental Table S3, DIU genes in pathways enrichment; Supplemental Table S4, identity and expression of IFN genes exhibiting DIU.
